_documentation.purpose: Simulates increased demand during exam season (IB, SAT, finals). Demand increases significantly while supply may become constrained.
_documentation.usage: Loaded by ScenarioEngine when admin activates 'Exam Season Surge' scenario. Applies multipliers to streams and injects external events.
_documentation.example: When activated, customer.tutor.search increases 60% (multiplier 1.6), session.booking.requested increases 50% (multiplier 1.5), and 'IB Exam Season begins' event is injected.
